<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   samesign ult + samesign ult -&gt; samesign ult</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   samesign ult + ult -&gt; ult</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   samesign ult + slt -&gt; slt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ult + ult -&gt; ult</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ult + slt -&gt; std::nullopt</span></CodeLine>
